pages.text:
About
The Luxurious Boutique That's a Longtime Favorite
The southern charm was built into The Waterfront Inn, and our legacy has grown with every visitor who has enjoyed our hospitality. Our boutique hotel offers much more than spacious, upscale rooms appointed with all the modern amenities. Our well-manicured property offers stunning vistas of both Lake Sumter and Palmer Legends Championship Golf Course. Enjoy cocktail hour or treat yourself to a delectable dish at Calypso, our on-site restaurant. Unwind in the outdoor pool, soak in our whirlpool spa, or stroll down to Market Square to enjoy shopping and entertainment. From spending a single night's stay to hosting a full wedding reception or corporate event, The Waterfront Inn is ready to make your time here unforgettable.
We've Taken Care of Everything
Don't hesitate to let us know how we may make your stay more pleasurable. The staff of The Waterfront Inn is here to serve.
Amenities
Heated outdoor pool
Whirpool outdoor hot tub
Fitness center
Mini-fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and safe in each room
Complimentary WiFi
TVs
On-site restaurant, Calypso
Market
The Local Area
Whether you drive, take a golf cart, or enjoy a leisurely stroll down to Lake Sumter Landing's Market Square, you'll find much to do in Florida's friendliest town. The three bustling town squares are filled with opportunities for dining, drinking, dancing, and shopping. In addition to the local area attractions, we are located within a short drive of many world famous entertainment options.
Getting Here
Whether you're flying into Florida or driving from somewhere more local, let us guide the way. When you get here, you can always count on complimentary parking in a well-lit lot.
Learn More
FAQ
You've got questions, and we've got answers. Before calling, check out our Frequently Asked Questions to see if we can provide a quick solution.
Do you have a guest loyalty program or rewards?
Yes, our guest loyalty program is through Guestbook, learn more about our offering or sign-up
here
.
Are pets allowed?
We allow dogs and cats at The Waterfront Inn. Dogs or cats must not weigh more than 55 lbs and must be domesticated. No more than two pets per room are allowed. There is a non-refundable pet charge of $75 for up to 7 nights and $125 for up to 14 days. Please contact our team for long-term stays. Pets may not be left unattended in rooms and pets are not permitted in Hotel restaurants or other Hotel food and beverage areas as well as the meeting rooms, the pool, and the fitness center.
What is the hotels firearm policy?
While The Waterfront Inn recognizes that hotel guests and visitors may legally possess firearms, we prohibit firearms on hotel property. This policy is intended to create a safe environment for all who visit The Waterfront Inn by providing appropriate guidance over the custody of firearms on the premises. Please keep in mind that the safety and security of hotel guests and patrons is of utmost importance. The Waterfront Inn prohibits persons from carrying or otherwise possessing a firearm on hotel property, including carrying firearms in an open or concealed manner. This policy applies to all firearms, regardless of whether the firearm is a handgun or long-barreled gun. The Waterfront Inn reserves the right to request guests and visitors who fail to abide by this policy to leave the hotel premises. Failure to leave at the request of the hotel may result in Police Department contact, and may subject you to further legal action for failure to abide by this policy, including trespass.
This policy does not apply to on-duty law enforcement officers.
Is there daily housekeeping?
Housekeeping stayover service will be provided every other day of the guests stay or upon request. To request other special arrangements, please contact the Front Desk. If you prefer to simply to have your amenities refreshed, or trash or soiled towels removed and replaced, please notify Front Desk. In addition, room supplies, amenities and linen are always available to you 24/7 by simply contacting our Front Desk at extension “0”.
How do I rent a golf cart?
Call The Villages Golf Cart at 352.753.6750 to make a reservation. The rental facility is located within walking distance
from The Waterfront
Do you have any smoking rooms?
The Waterfront Inn is a nonsmoking hotel.
Is there valet parking?
We do not offer valet parking; however, our surface parking lot on-site is complimentary.
How can we set up a tee time?
To reserve a tee time, call any of the Championship Course's clubhouses:
Belle Glade 352.674.2700
Bonifay 352.753.1776
Cane Garden 352.751.7209
Evan's Prairie 352.205.8910
Glenview Champions 352.753.3345
Hacienda Hills 352.753.5155
Havana 352.750.8085
Lopez Legacy 352.753.1450
Mallory Hill 352.753.3730
Orange Blossom Hills 352.753.5200
Palmer Legends 352.753.5300
Tierra Del Sol 352.750.4600
Visit
golfinthevillages.com
for more information.
Are there any rooms with separate bedrooms?
We do not offer multi-room suites, but our spacious single rooms include the choice of a king bed or two queen beds.
Is the pool heated?
Yes, the temperature of the pool is always a comfortable 84 degrees or higher.
What time does the pool and hot tub close?
The pool and hot tub are open from 8 AM to 10 PM daily.
Do you have a fitness center?
Yes
.
What is your cancellation policy?
Out of respect for others attempting to make reservations, we require cancellations to be made at least 48 hours in advance of your stay, and we will happily provide a full refund.
Contact
We're always ready to serve you. Feel free to contact us via email or pick up the phone and say hello.

This field is required.

This field is required.

An Accommodating Host for Your Gathering
Whether making your special wedding day even more extraordinary or turning a corporate meeting into an event to remember, The Waterfront Inn is the ideal host. Talk to our event planning staff about how we can take care of every detail of your upcoming meeting, luncheon, retreat, wedding, or other special occasion.
Weddings
The serene setting provides stunning views for your special day, but it's our staff that creates the real magic. When you choose The Waterfront Inn to host your wedding, our expert event planning team will walk you through every step of the process and take care of every detail.
Photo Credit | Keptya Photography
Learn More
Meetings and Events
Whether it's a corporate retreat, family reunion, professional conference, or any other occasion, The Waterfront Inn offers the perfect setting. Our on-site catering team will take care of all your needs, from breakfast to dinner. Our elegant rooms provide a private respite for those staying overnight. And our event management staff has the experience to anticipate your needs and outperform your expectations.
Onsite Catering
At any group event, it's all about food. From elegant evening dinners to casual retreat lunches, our catering team delivers inspired menu options and first class service. From breakfast to dinner and every coffee or snack break in between, let us make an impression on your group.
Photo Credit | Keptya Photography
Catering Menu
Group Reservations
Whether hosting a wedding or meeting or bringing people together for a reunion or sporting event, we can help you book ten or more rooms at a discounted rate.
Private Event Software powered by Tripleseat
